src:
Pelaku Sekaligus Provokator Kerusuhan Wamena Ditangkap
01 Nov 2019, 17:19 by Wilpret Siagian
Jayapura - Polisi menangkap YA (45) salah satu pelaku sekaligus provokator kerusuhan Wamena pada (23/9) lalu. YA ditangkap di rumahnya di Kampung Ninabua Distrik Asolokobal, kabupaten Jayawijaya.
"Saat ditangkap YA (45) sempat melakukan perlawanan dan hendak melarikan diri, sehingga aparat melumpuhkan dengan tembakan terukur di kaki," jelas Kabid Humas Polda Papua, Kombes Ahmad Musthofa Kamal, di Jayapura, Jumat (1/11/2019).
YA ditangkap dini hari tadi pukul 03.00 WIT, di rumahnya. Pada saat akan dibawa ke kendaraan, jelas Kamal, tersangka berusaha melarikan diri dengan melawan petugas namun upayanya tak berhasil.
"Tersangka saat sudah di amankan di Mapolres Jayawijaya untuk penyidikan lebih lanjut," kata Kamal.
text:
Actor and Wamena Riot Provocate Arrested
01 Nov 2019, 17:19 by Wilpret Siagian
Jayapura - Police arrested YA (45), one of the perpetrators and provocateurs of the Wamena riot (9/23). YA was arrested at her home in Kampung Ninabua Asolokobal District, Jayawijaya district.
"When arrested YA (45) had a chance to fight and wanted to flee, so that the authorities paralyzed with a shot measured in the leg," said Head of Papua Police Public Relations, Senior Commissioner Ahmad Musthofa Kamal, in Jayapura, Friday (11/01/2019).
YA was arrested early this morning at 03.00 CET, at his home. At the time of being taken to the vehicle, explained Kamal, the suspect tried to escape by fighting the officers but his efforts were unsuccessful.
"The suspect was already secured at Jayawijaya Police Headquarters for further investigation," Kamal said.
